\begin{matlabcode}
clear;
syms x f(x) h(x)
f(x) = 1;
h(x) = x^3;

F(x) = [h(x)*f(x); ...
    diff(h(x),x)*f(x); ...
    diff(diff(h(x),x),x)*f(x)] ...
%     diff(diff(diff(h(x),x),x),x)*f(x)]
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
F(x) = 

\hskip1em $\displaystyle \left(\begin{array}{c}
x^3 \\
3\,x^2 \\
6\,x
\end{array}\right)$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
dF(x) = diff(F(x),x);
rank_Fx = rank(dF(0))
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlaboutput}
rank_Fx = 1
\end{matlaboutput}


\begin{matlabcode}
clear;
syms x f(x) h(x)
f(x) = 1;
h(x) = x*exp(-1/x^2);

F(x) = [h(x)*f(x);...
    diff(h(x),x)*f(x); ...
    diff(diff(h(x),x),x)*f(x);...
    diff(diff(diff(h(x),x),x),x)*f(x); ...
    diff(diff(diff(diff(h(x),x),x),x),x)*f(x); ...
    diff(diff(diff(diff(diff(h(x),x),x),x),x),x)*f(x); ...
    diff(diff(diff(diff(diff(diff(h(x),x),x),x),x),x))*f(x)];
dF(x) = diff(F(x),x)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
dF(x) = 

\hskip1em $\displaystyle \begin{array}{l}
\left(\begin{array}{c}
\sigma_1 +\frac{2\,\sigma_1 }{x^2 }\\
\frac{4\,\sigma_1 }{x^5 }-\frac{2\,\sigma_1 }{x^3 }\\
\frac{6\,\sigma_1 }{x^4 }-\frac{24\,\sigma_1 }{x^6 }+\frac{8\,\sigma_1 }{x^8 }\\
\frac{156\,\sigma_1 }{x^7 }-\frac{24\,\sigma_1 }{x^5 }-\frac{112\,\sigma_1 }{x^9 }+\frac{16\,\sigma_1 }{x^{11} }\\
\frac{120\,\sigma_1 }{x^6 }-\frac{1140\,\sigma_1 }{x^8 }+\frac{1320\,\sigma_1 }{x^{10} }-\frac{400\,\sigma_1 }{x^{12} }+\frac{32\,\sigma_1 }{x^{14} }\\
\frac{9360\,\sigma_1 }{x^9 }-\frac{720\,\sigma_1 }{x^7 }-\frac{15480\,\sigma_1 }{x^{11} }+\frac{7440\,\sigma_1 }{x^{13} }-\frac{1248\,\sigma_1 }{x^{15} }+\frac{64\,\sigma_1 }{x^{17} }\\
\frac{5040\,\sigma_1 }{x^8 }-\frac{85680\,\sigma_1 }{x^{10} }+\frac{189000\,\sigma_1 }{x^{12} }-\frac{127680\,\sigma_1 }{x^{14} }+\frac{33600\,\sigma_1 }{x^{16} }-\frac{3584\,\sigma_1 }{x^{18} }+\frac{128\,\sigma_1 }{x^{20} }
\end{array}\right)\\
\mathrm{}\\
\textrm{where}\\
\mathrm{}\\
\;\;\sigma_1 ={\mathrm{e}}^{-\frac{1}{x^2 }} 
\end{array}$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
val = limit(dF(x),x,0)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlabsymbolicoutput}
val = 

\hskip1em $\displaystyle \left(\begin{array}{c}
0\\
0\\
0\\
0\\
0\\
0\\
0
\end{array}\right)$
\end{matlabsymbolicoutput}
\begin{matlabcode}
rank_Fx = rank(val)
\end{matlabcode}
\begin{matlaboutput}
rank_Fx = 0
